title: This Week in Tech: New Shoes from Rapha and Trek, Titanium Cranks, and Maap Debuts New Kit
content:
Its a busy one here, with an updated titanium crank from Cane Creek, a new steel gravel bike from Battaglin, tube-only tires from Pirelli, and more.

Read the full article at This Week in Tech: New Shoes from Rapha and Trek, Titanium Cranks, and Maap Debuts New Kit on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
